FTL.text: Increases the operating speed of space drones by 50%.
太空无人机的运作速度提高50%。
Increases the operating speed of both crew drones and space drones by 100%. Does not stack up with Space Drone Booster.
可以同时将船员无人机和太空无人机的运作速度提高100%。其效果不与太空无人机增压器叠加。
Enemy crew inside a *system room* with temporal effect on your own ship will be stunned. Crew drones are immune from this.
敌方船员在本舰上有时流效果的系统舱室内会被眩晕。船员无人机不受此效果影响。
Ion effects on non-auxiliary systems (including Teleporter, Cloaking, Battery, Mind Control, Hacking, and Temporal) are speeded up by 100%.
非辅助系统（包括传送、隐形、电池、心控、黑客和时流）上的离子效果加速100%。
Allows your mind control system to manipulate hormones, causing the mind-controlled person to act 100% faster and have a faster metabolism.
允许你的心灵控制系统操纵荷尔蒙，使得被心灵控制者的行动速度和新陈代谢加快100%。
Upgrades the hacking system's hacking software to version 2.0, which makes hacking 50% faster.
将黑客系统的黑客软件升级为2.0版本，使得黑客攻击速度加快50%。
All crew members of this ship, whether hostile or friendly, have their act speed and metabolism accelerated by 100%.
本舰所有船员，无论敌对还是友方，其行动速度和新陈代谢都会加快100%。

A homebrew overclocking software. It provides very limited system acceleration.
[Level 0 Overclocker] Acceleration Level: 1 Acceleration Duration: 10 seconds Cooldown Time: 50 seconds Power Consumption: 1

船员自制的超频软件。它能提供的系统加速效果十分有限。
[0级超频器] 加速等级：1级 加速时长：10秒 冷却时间：50秒 能源消耗：1格

A plug and play system overclocker. Provides the same system acceleration effect as the temporal system, but does not speed up the crew.
[Level 1 Overclocker] Acceleration Level: 2 Acceleration Duration: 10 seconds Cooldown Time: 50 seconds Power Consumption: 2

一种即插即用的系统超频器。可提供与时流系统相同的系统加速效果，但不能加速船员。
[1级超频器] 加速等级：2级 加速时长：10秒 冷却时间：50秒 能源消耗：2格

A system overclocker from the distant past, constructed with algorithms that are incomprehensible to modern people, and more powerful than normal system overclockers.
[Level 2 Overclocker] Acceleration Level: 2 Acceleration Duration: 15 seconds Cooldown Time: 30 seconds Power Consumption: 3

来自远古的系统超频器，以现代人无法理解的算法构建的超频系统，比一般的系统超频器更为强大。
[2级超频器] 加速等级：2级 加速时长：15秒 冷却时间：30秒 能源消耗：3格

This is perhaps the most powerful system overclocker you can find in the entire multiverse.
[Level 3 Overclocker] Acceleration Level: 3 Acceleration Duration: 5 seconds Cooldown Time: 25 seconds Power Consumption: 4

这也许是你能在整个多元宇宙中找到的最强大的系统超频器。
[3级超频器] 加速等级：3级 加速时长：5秒 冷却时间：25秒 能源消耗：4格
Install internal upgrades for the temporal system.
为时流系统安装内部升级
[Temporal Mastery] Settings Here you can set the difficulty options for this mod. The difficulty options for this mod will affect the configuration of all enemy ships (yes, all).
[时流掌控] 设置菜单 在这里你可以设置本模组的难度选项。本模组的难度选项会对所有敌舰（是的，所有）的配置产生影响。
当前难度等级：开发者模式
Set difficulty level to Developer Mode.
将难度设为开发者模式
Which upgrade for the temporal system would you like to install?
Upgrade to Level 3 [UNAVAILABLE: system is not level 2]
升级到第三级 [不可用: 系统未达到二级]
戏法空间（与三级时流不兼容）
（无人机）无人机功放器 [已安装]
（传送器）纳米时流传送器 [已安装]
（引擎）超光速引擎加速器 [已安装]
You are about to upgrade the temporal system to level 3.
你即将把时流系统升级到第三级。
This upgrade is unavailable. Is not compatible with Trick Room.
这项升级不可用，与戏法空间不兼容。
You are about to install the Trick Room. [Effects: On the player's ship, special effects caused by the temporal system are reversed]
你即将安装戏法空间。 [效果：在玩家的舰船上，逆反由时流系统造成的特殊效果]
This upgrade is unavailable. Is not compatible with Level 3 temporal system and above.
这项升级不可用，与三级及以上时流系统不兼容。
You are about to install the Breeder Reactor. [Effects: Doubles the rate of power generation when speeding up the battery system]
你即将安装增殖反应堆。 [效果：用时流加速电池系统时产生额外能量的速度翻倍]
This upgrade is unavailable. Battery system is not installed.
这项升级不可用，未安装电池系统。

You are about to install the Drone Amplifier. [Effects: Acceleration to the drone system will no longer increase the speed of space drones, but rather increase the number of projectiles fired by space drones.]
Level 1 Temporal: no effect Level 2 Temporal: twice projectiles Level 3 Temporal: triple projectiles Level 4 Temporal: quadruple projectiles

你即将安装无人机功放器。 [效果：对无人机系统加速将不再提高太空无人机的速度，而是增加太空无人机发射的投射物数量。]
一级时流：无效果 二级时流：两倍投射物 三级时流：三倍投射物 四级时流：四倍投射物
This upgrade is unavailable. Drone system is not installed.
这项升级不可用，未安装无人机系统。

You are about to install the Temporal-Bot Dispersal. [Effects: When the medbay is powered and being accelerated, all allied crew on the player's ship (including those being mind-controlled) gain the speed up effect of the temporal system. Each level of medbay provides 25% of temporal system's speed up effect.]
你即将安装纳米时流机。 [效果：医疗舱有供能且对医疗舱进行时流加速时，本舰所有己方船员（包括被心控的船员）获得时流系统的加速效果。每级医疗舱可提供时流系统25%的加速效果。]
This upgrade is unavailable. Medbay is not installed.
这项升级不可用，未安装医疗舱。

You are about to install the Temporal-Bot Teleporter. [Effects: When the teleporter is fully powered and being accelerated, all allied crew on the enemy ship (including those being mind-controlled) gain the speed up effect of the temporal system. However it's only half as effective, which means it only provides 50% of temporal system's speed up effect.]
你即将安装纳米时流传送器。 [效果：传送器有4格供能且对传送器进行时流加速时，敌舰所有己方船员（包括被心控的船员）获得时流系统的加速效果。然而其加速效果只有时流系统的一半。]
This upgrade is unavailable. Teleporter is not level 4.
这项升级不可用，传送器未达到四级。

You are about to install the Selective Acceleration. [Effects: The acceleration effect on weapons becomes twice as effective, but becomes only able to speed up the first slot.]
Level 1 Temporal: +25%*2 Level 2 Temporal: +70%*2 Level 3 Temporal: +150%*2 Level 4 Temporal: +500%*2

你即将安装选择性加速。 [效果：对武器的加速效果变为原先的两倍，但是变得只能加速第一个槽位的武器。]
一级时流：+25%*2 二级时流：+70%*2 三级时流：+150%*2 四级时流：+500%*2
This upgrade is unavailable. Weapon system is not installed.
这项升级不可用，未安装武器系统。
You are about to install the Temporal FTL Booster. [Effects: The temporal system can now speed up or slow down the recharge rate of the ship's FTL drive.]
你即将安装超光速引擎加速器。 [效果：时流系统可以加快或减慢本舰超光速引擎的充能速度。]
This upgrade is unavailable. Engines are not installed.
这项升级不可用，未安装引擎。

You are about to install the Infinite Shield. [Effects: Accelerating the shield system will no longer increase the normal shield's recharge rate, but energy shields will no longer have a limit on their recharge and will recharge twice as fast.]
你即将安装无限护盾。 [效果：对护盾系统加速将不再提高正常护盾的充能速度，但是能量护盾的充能将不再有限制并且其充能速度变为两倍。]
This upgrade is unavailable. Shield system is not installed.
这项升级不可用，未安装护盾系统。

You are about to install the Multi-Person Mind Control. [Effects: When speeding up your mind control system, enemy crewmembers under mind control will not be speeded up, but instead more enemy crewmembers will be under mind control, depending on your speed up level.]
你即将安装多人心控。 [效果：加速心灵控制系统时，受心灵控制的敌方船员不再会被加速，而是会有更多的敌方船员受心灵控制，人数取决于你的加速等级。]
This upgrade is unavailable. Mind Control system is not installed.
这项升级不可用，未安装心控系统。

You are about to install the Hacking Surge. [Effects: When speeding up your hacking system, you can no longer speed up the hacking process; instead, more enemy systems will be hacked, depending on your speed up level. The additional systems to hack are randomly determined.]
你即将安装黑客能量涌动。 [效果：加速黑客系统将不再加速黑客攻击进程，而是会有更多敌方系统遭受黑客攻击，数量取决于你的加速等级。额外遭受黑客攻击的系统是随机决定的。]
This upgrade is unavailable. Hacking system is not installed.
这项升级不可用，未安装黑客系统。
